SEARCH
Package PatientManager

Class MedicalRecManager

java.lang.Object
PatientManager.MedicalRecManager
public class MedicalRecManager extends Object
The MedicalRecManager class is responsible for managing patient medical records. It provides methods to view individual medical records and to view all medical records for a specific doctor. This class interacts with the patient database stored in a CSV file to retrieve and display medical record information.

  • Method Details

    • viewMedicalRecords

      public static void viewMedicalRecords(String patientID)
      Views the medical records for a specific patient identified by their patient ID. This method reads the patient database file and displays the medical record details of the patient matching the given patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the unique identifier for the patient whose records are to be viewed

    • viewAllMedicalRecordsForDoc

      public static void viewAllMedicalRecordsForDoc(String doctorID)
      Views all medical records for patients associated with a specific doctor identified by their doctor ID. This method reads the patient database file and displays all medical records for patients whose doctor ID matches the provided doctor ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the unique identifier for the doctor whose patients' records are to be viewed
